mapper.insert: insert into `teacher` (username, password,academe, name, phone, role) values (#{username},#{password},#{academe},#{name},#{phone},#{role})

select * from `teacher`
and username like CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and academe like CONCAT('%', #{academe}, '%')
